imdb.plot outline: "Working Stories" ("Hacklergschichten und Arbeitssachen") is a documentary TV series about unemployed people looking for a job. In every episode three candidates get the opportunity to present themselves and talk about their work experience and potential dream jobs. "Working Stories" will broadcast bimonthly on the local Austrian TV Station Okto.
imdb.title: Hacklergschichten und Arbeitssachen
plot: "Working Stories" ("_Hacklergschichten und Arbeitssachen_ (qv)") is a documentary TV series about unemployed people looking for a job. In every episode three candidates get the opportunity to present themselves and talk about their work experience and potential dream jobs. "Working Stories" will broadcast bimonthly on the local Austrian TV Station Okto.
